# Dataset x Node Support Matrix (Profile View)

Profile-oriented view. These rows mirror DOE profile capabilities in utilities/doe.py.

| Task Type | Profile | Typical Datasets | get_data | curate | labels | split | featurize/use | preprocess + select | train | train.tdc | analyze | explain |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Regression | `reg_local_csv` | flash, qm9, ysi, pah | `local_csv` | `properties` (+ optional `smiles_column`, `dedupe_strategy`, `keep_all_columns`) |  | `holdout / cv / nested_holdout_cv`<br>`random / scaffold` | `use.curated_features`, `featurize.rdkit`, `featurize.morgan` | Yes (feature input required; `select.features` requires `preprocess.features`) | `random_forest`, `svm`, `decision_tree`, `xgboost`, `ensemble`, `dl_*` |  |  | Yes |
| Regression | `reg_chembl_ic50` | chembl (urease regression) | `chembl` | `properties: standard_value`, `keep_all_columns` | `label.ic50` | `holdout / cv / nested_holdout_cv`<br>`random / scaffold` | `featurize.lipinski` + `featurize.rdkit` (rdkit input required) | Yes (feature input required; `select.features` requires `preprocess.features`) | `random_forest`, `svm`, `decision_tree`, `xgboost`, `ensemble`, `dl_*` |  | `stats`, `eda` | Yes |
| Classification | `clf_local_csv` | pgp, ara | `local_csv` | `properties`, `smiles_column`, `dedupe_strategy`, `label_column` | Optional `label.normalize` (required if target is not already binary) | `holdout / cv / nested_holdout_cv`<br>`random / scaffold` | `catboost_classifier`/`dl_*`: one of `use.curated_features`, `featurize.rdkit`, `featurize.morgan`<br>`chemprop`: no tabular feature node required | Yes for non-chemprop (requires feature input). Not supported with `chemprop`. | `catboost_classifier`, `chemprop`, `dl_*` |  |  | Yes* (chemprop explain is skipped) |
| Classification | `clf_tdc_benchmark` | pgp_tdc_benchmark |  |  |  |  |  |  |  | `catboost_classifier` |  |  |

## Notes

- `train` and `train.tdc` are mutually exclusive.
- `train.tdc` must be terminal (last node).
- `split` must appear before `preprocess.features`, `select.features`, `train`, and `explain`.
- `chemprop` cannot be paired with `preprocess.features`/`select.features` in DOE validation.
- Runtime warns and skips explainability for chemprop.
- `clf_tdc_benchmark` uses a `train.tdc`-only pipeline (no `get_data` node).
